parameters.name: CommandIDs
parameters.description: Array of command IDs for the buttons

parameters.name: TextDisplayStyles
parameters.description: Array of the text display styles for the buttons as defined in swCommandTabButtonTextDisplay_e

title: ICommandTabBox.GetCommands
description: Gets the buttons' command IDs, text display styles, and number of commands on the CommandManager tab box.
signature:
System.Int32 GetCommands( 
   out System.Object
CommandIDs
,
   out System.Object
TextDisplayStyles
)

parameters.name: CommandIDs
parameters.description: Array of command IDs for the buttons

parameters.name: TextDisplayStyles
parameters.description: Array of the text display styles for the buttons as defined in swCommandTabButtonTextDisplay_e

returns: Number of buttons on this CommandManager tab box
